nodes.text: Depa Billaba's lightsaber was a blue-bladed lightsaber utilized by Jedi Master Depa Billaba during the Clone Wars.

Depa Billaba's lightsaber first appeared in the comic book Kanan 1, the first issue of the comic series Star Wars: Kanan. Concept art of the weapon created for Star Wars: The Clone Wars in 2012 showed it with a blue blade, but Kanan depicted it as green instead. The blue color was brought back by the reference book Star Wars: The Lightsaber Collection and the television episode "Aftermath".
